thread.section_title: PromGirl Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PromGirl | www.promgirl.com | 7 of 539
thread.title: Deborah

author: Deborah
title: Deborah
text: Ordered a Prom Dress for my daughter that she tried on in another store. The other store (Estelle's) wanted to sell her the sample which was falling apart and had been used in a fashion show (for which they told me they would have the dress fixed). Found the same dress on PromGirl and placed my order (same price). Received the dress in a few days. You could tell the dress shipped had never been tried on. I'm happy and my daughter is happy!
